articles.author: Harmeet Kaur, CNN
articles.title: Dante Barksdale, who worked for more than a decade to keep Baltimore's streets safe from gun violence, is shot and killed
articles.description: Barksdale, 46, was discovered with a gunshot wound to his head on Sunday morning near Douglass Homes, a public housing development in southeast Baltimore, according to Baltimore police. The circumstances around his death are still unclear.

articles.author: Cheri Mossburg, CNN
articles.title: California tops 3 million Covid-19 cases
articles.description: California has become the first state in the nation to record more than 3 million Covid-19 cases, according to data from Johns Hopkins University and the Covid Tracking Project.

articles.title: Navalny calls Putin a 'toad' after detention
articles.description: Russia's leading Kremlin critic Alexey Navalny is calling on his supporters to hit the streets for nationwide protests in Russia after he was detained by local police moments after returning to the country.

articles.author: Nicole Chavez, CNN
articles.title: Martin Luther King Jr. would be 'greatly disappointed' in our nation, his son says
articles.description: The oldest son of the late Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. and Coretta Scott King said his father would be greatly disappointed in the nation if he were still alive.
